thread.title: Jane Collins libel case: Three Labour Rotherham MPs awarded £54,000
thread.title_full: Jane Collins libel case: Three Labour Rotherham MPs awarded £54,000

title: Jane Collins libel case: Three Labour Rotherham MPs awarded £54,000
text:
Close share panel Image copyright PA Image caption Jane Collins applied for immunity to the European Parliament but it refused to grant it Rotherham's three Labour MPs have each won £54,000 High Court libel damages from UKIP MEP Jane Collins over remarks she made about the town's child abuse scandal. 
Ms Collins, who represents Yorkshire and North Lincolnshire, claimed Sir Kevin Barron, John Healey and Sarah Champion knew about child exploitation in the town but did nothing to intervene. 
More follows.
